bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of lumps forming in chest and abdomen that are fixed and cannot be moved, with pain at a specific location. It was believed that these lumps were generated by the five depots. Nan jing 難經 55: 積者，陰氣也，其始發有常處，其痛不 離其部，上下有所終始，左右有所窮處 , “ Accumulations [consist of] yin qi. They stay where they developed in the first place. The pain [they cause] does not leave this section. Their upper and lower [extensions are clearly marked by] the end and beginning; to the left and to the right locations where they subside [are clearly defined]”.
